description: Filmed at the vast Waldbuhne outdoor arena in Berlin this program captures Joe Cocker at his very best in front of huge crowd. This spectacular show includes all his hits and best loved tracks including: Delta Lady, Up Where We Be...
name: Joe Cocker: Across from Midnight

original_info.id: Joe Cocker: Across From Midnight Tour_1997
original_info.name: Joe Cocker: Across From Midnight Tour

review.name: Joe Cocker In Concert
review.reviewBody: Im 70 Years Old, Watched The Beatles on Ed Sullivan in Black/White TV Crossed legged on the floor, Strictly an Entertainee (Ha Ha) Ive seen a ton of shows. Have no idea how this "Gem" got past me but sang You Are So Beautiful in Karaoke at a Trailer Park To my GrandDaughter jokingly in Joe Cocker Voice (More Ha Ha) as 13 year old (who takes Ballet and Tap lessons) improve danced to song. So overwhelmed I tracked down this concert DVD and Auto Bio and over a Bottle of Italian Red I was reinvigorated at what Joe Cocker Brought to the Industry as a 1st Class Singer, He put together an exceptional Band cast at this gorgeous Venue. How Wonderful Someone can leave a legacy that comes straight from the heart to me and you. Too bad We couldn't see a Sade /Joe Cocker Tour[Last Ha Ha
